content.question: The passage is an example of which of the following regarding twentieth-century Christianity?

choices.label: Attempts by Christian churches to formulate responses to the pressing political issues of the period
An emphasis on social work and helping those in need in the works of church leaders and theologians
Christian leaders’ adherence to conservative positions on matters related to gender roles and family life
Debates over Christian churches’ role in the social and political life of an increasingly multicultural Europe

content.answer: Attempts by Christian churches to formulate responses to the pressing political issues of the period

topic.text: 9.15: Continuity and Change in the 20th and 21st Centuries

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
